rukus.text: Arra no meirei wa (kanarazu) kuru. Sore o isoide motomete wa naranai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare hakare-ra ga doto ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru

Kare wa sono shimo be no naka no, o kokoronikanau-sha ni, kare ga meiji rareta keiji o mota sete, tenshi o noko wa sa re (ko ose rareta). `Ware no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Dakara ware ni anata gata no gimu o hatasu yo kankoku shi nasai
Kare wa shinri ni yotte, ten to ji o sozo nasa reta nodearu. Kare hakare-ra ga doto ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru
Kare wa 一精滴 Kara ningen o tsukura reta. Shikashi miruga i. Kare (ningen) wa kozen to iron o tonaeru
Mata kare wa, kachiku o anata gata (ningen no tame) ni tsukura reta. Anata gata wa, sorera ni yori dan'i ya shuju no ben'eki o e tari, mata sorera o shokuyo to suru
Yugata ni sorera o (ie ni) kari modosu toki, mata asa ni (maki-chi e) karitateru toki, anata gata wa sorera ni yasashisa o kanjiru
Mata anata gataga mizukara kuro shinakereba tasshi gatai kuni ni, sorera wa anata gata no omoni o hakobu. Hontoni anata gata no omo wa, shinsetsude jihibukai kata de ara reru
Mata (kare wa) uma to raba to roba (o tsukura reta). Korera wa anata gata no joyo to kazari no tamedearu. Mata kare wa anata gata no shiranai,(-gai no) iroirona mono o tsukura reta
(Tadashi) michi ni hokodzukeru no wa, arra no shigotodearu.Daga magatta michi mo aru. Moshi kare no okokoro ga nozomunaraba, anata gata wa isseini michibika retadearou
